molecular.statistics.time_series.tcorr¶

molecular.statistics.time_series.tcorr(a)[source]¶

Compute equilibration time \(\tau_{corr}\) based on the autocorrelation function \(\rho(t)\).

\[\tau_{corr} = \sum_{t=1}^{T} (1 - \frac{t}{T}) \rho_{t}\]
Parameters

a (numpy.ndarray) – 1D array.

Returns

Correlation time.

Return type

float

References

molecular
